name: SHORTCUTS
description:
Here's my entry to the What-a-jam game jam ! 

I limited myself to a 24h dev time and *almost* made it !

The game is a platformer where you help the alt key find his buddies ctrl and del, while avoiding his mortal enemy, the f4 key :) You use common shortcuts to modify your environment (ctrl c, ctrl v, backspace, etc.)

Have fun !
